title: Lost Of A Memory
description:
Description :
        Charlotte doesn't remember being hit by a car. In fact, she doesn't remember anything. She wakes up in the hospital room and has to start her whole life over again. First starting with her name and everything leading to the accident.She knows her name is Charlotte but who is Charlotte? She wonders who she is or who she is going to be now. and who's that boy who has to be by her side and keep her Safe?
